summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2014 FORD MUSTANG. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE DRIVING AT APPROXIMATELY 65 MPH, THE CONTACT CRASHED INTO A DEER ON THE SIDE OF THE ROAD. THE AIR BAGS FAILED TO DEPLOY. THE CONTACT DID NOT SUSTAIN INJURIES. A POLICE REPORT WAS FILED. IN ADDITION, THE CONTACT STATED THAT THERE WAS SEVERE DAMAGE TO THE FRONT END OF THE VEHICLE. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO GATORLAND COLLISION CENTER. THEN TAKEN TO BUCHHOLZ PAINT AND AUTOBODY FOR THE REPAIR WHERE THE RADIATOR SUPPORTS AND THE FENDER APRON WERE REPLACED. THE VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED. THE CONTACT RECEIVED A RECALL NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 15V319000 ( AIR BAGS) AND HAD TAKEN THE VEHICLE TO PARKS FORD DEALER, LOCATED ON 3333 N MAIN ST, GAINESVILLE FL 32609, WHERE THEY HAD INFORMED THE CONTACT THAT THE VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED. THE CONTACT HOWEVER RECEIVED SEVERAL EMAILS AND MAIL NOTIFICATIONS FROM FORD MANUFACTURER TO TAKE THE VEHICLE IN FOR THE RECALL SERVICED. THE CONTACT STATED THAT MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE AND INFORMED THE CONTACT THAT THE REPAIR WAS DONE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 51,000. VIN TOOLS CONFIRMS PART NOT AVAILABLE.
